attributes.action: Award Nigel Farage a Peerage in honour of a lifetime of fighting for Britain.
attributes.additional_details: Now that we have finally woken up and voted to leave, we should show our appreciation of this man's work and stop being blinkered by left wing diatribe accusing him....and all the rest of us, of racism.  He is NOT racist and deserves all our gratitude for  Independence Day - June 23rd 2016
attributes.background: Nigel Farage has spent his entire political career spelling out, to normal British people, how we have been exploited by unelected, faceless people in Brussels. We have been forced to allow hundreds of thousands of undesireables into our country against our will.
